actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to establish the Rocky Gorge National Environmental Center, and for other purposes.
short_title: Rocky Gorge National Environmental Center Act

summary.text: Rocky Gorge National Environmental Center Act - Directs the Secretary of the Interior to establish the Rocky Gorge National Environmental Center, Maryland, and to provide for wildlife-oriented recreation and nature study within such area. Authorizes appropriations to carry out the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: Rocky Gorge National Environmental Center Act
A bill to establish the Rocky Gorge National Environmental Center, and for other purposes.
